title: Max AP at lvl 1 Masteries
body: I am looking for the max AP possible to get lvl 1, I already have the runes. I am not sure about what my mastery page should look like though. Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: only half of the tree is AP related. so 21 is the most needed.
Yes, but he didn't ask for anything else, only full ap. So why not 30/0/0?
This is what Faker used other night all 3 matches against Anarchy

galio has 16 ap free at lvl 1 and if you go 17/13 in  you can get an extra 2.5 if you take the 5 magic resist, + 7 ap from masteries + amp tome,
Quints + glyphs give 15 ap = (35 + 16 + 7 +2.5) = 50.5 ap

all you need now is to include marks and seals + 6%ap from runes

depends, on spawn or say a cass with drag and her passive has naturally reached lv 3 over time? Does this include items? Could this include veigar stacking  q before lv 1? (killing minions with q in 5 team lane)

_____

 66.339, with full flat ap runes, the flat + scaling + % ap masteries and {{item:1052}} at lv 1, no other added effects, this value could only be changed by galio, with a value of around 83.1915
Max AP is as simple as getting all the AP masteries and then whatever other masteries you want.
